Ensure student journalism survives PERIOD Donate today PERIOD

By  Greg RivaraFebruary  

The Administrative Ad Hoc Parking Committee will meet at  a.m PERIOD today to address three parking proposals in order to make a recommendation to NIU President John LaTourette PERIOD

Ad Hoc Committee Member Henry Winsor stated in a report dated Jan PERIOD  three proposals have been made PERIOD Copies of the proposals were distributed and discussed briefly at the Feb PERIOD  meeting PERIOD

Blue permits are given to faculty and staff green to graduate students yellow to commuting students orange to students living in the residence halls and brown are given to offcampus students PERIOD

According to Winsors report Robert Bornheutter chairman of Campus Parking Committee said proposal one is a general consensus of members of NIUs parking committees PERIOD

The proposal states all brown lots except lot T west of the physical plant would be changed yellow or yelloworange PERIOD

Street parking south of Gabel Hall calling for brown parking permits would be changed to yellow PERIOD Lot C west of Garden Road and lot E east of the Chick Evans Field House would be changed from yellow to blue PERIOD

Lot G north of the Recreation Center accepting orangeyellow permits would be changed to accept only yellow permits while lot V east of Anderson Hall would be changed from brownorange to yelloworange permits PERIOD

Lot five near the visitors lot requiring blue permits would be changed to pay parking while lot D west of Neptune Hall taking orange permits would be changed to blue PERIOD Brown permit lot O west of Annie Glidden road would be changed to yelloworange PERIOD

Proposals one and two are the same with the exception being that lot five is not changed from staff to pay Winsor said PERIOD These proposals are collections of ideas by various committees and committee members he said PERIOD

Proposal three would change all brown lots except lot T west of the physical plant to yellow or yelloworange PERIOD Brown streetparking permits would be changed to yellow also PERIOD

Proposal three was devised by Winsor and Dave Stern Stern said PERIOD Stern is the cochairman of the Student Association Parking Committee PERIOD

The administration is proposing to change student parking to facultystaff and moving the student parking lots to remote locations on campus Stern said PERIOD

Hopefully proposal three will be recommended Stern said PERIOD He pointed out the committee had one student member and said The chances are not good for proposal three to be recommended. advertisement
